name: The Case Of Violet Reed
description:
After the murder of the little girl named Violet Reed, your daughter, the police have started investigation to see who the killer is. Since you are the closest to her, you will be interrogated. 

The interrogator will be asking you questions about what happened that day and what you did. Answer them to help the case.

This is a short horror game about a fictional murder case. If it has any similarity to any other cases that happened in real life, it is nothing but coincidental.
